mapper.select: SELECT /* CategoryMapper.getAllCategories */ category_id, name, parent_id, color FROM category
SELECT /* CategoryMapper.getAllChildCategories */ category_id, name, parent_id, color FROM category WHERE parent_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name
SELECT /* CategoryMapper.getAllParentCategories */ category_id, name, parent_id, color FROM category WHERE parent_id IS NULL ORDER BY name
SELECT /* CategoryMapper.getCategoryById */ category_id, name, parent_id, color FROM category WHERE category_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* CategoryMapper.createCategory */ category (name, parent_id, color) VALUES ( #{name}, #{parentId}, #{color} )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* CategoryMapper.updateCategory */ category SET name = #{name}, color = #{color}, parent_id = #{parentId} WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}
